content: सभा [सह भांति अभीष्टनिश्चयार्थमेकत्र यत्र गृहे <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} An assembly, a council, conclave; पंडितसभां कारितवाम् <ls>Pt. 1</ls>; न सा सभा यत्र न संति वृद्धाः <ls>H. 1.</ls> {@--2@} Company, society, meeting, large number. {@--3@} Council-chamber or hall. {@--4@} A court of justice. {@--5@} A public audience (modern {%levee%}). {@--6@} A gambling-house. {@--7@} Any room or place much frequented.
